title: SHOCK as FEMALE STAFFER ARRESTED in gory murder of gorgeous AR Senator
itunes:title: SHOCK as FEMALE STAFFER ARRESTED in gory murder of gorgeous AR Senator
description:
Former Arkansas State Senator, Linda Collins-Smith, found shot dead at her home. Police make a shocking arrest --a close female friend

AND

The police make a shocking discovery in a storage unit in Denver. The body of 7-year-old Caden McWilliams, found encased in concrete in an animal carrier. His family had not even reported the boy missing.

Nancy's Expert Panel Weighs in:

Karen Smith:  Forensics Expert

Darryl Cohen: Criminal Defense Attorney

Ashley Kelly:  Licensed Clinical Social Worker

Dr. Michelle Dupre:   Medical Examiner

David Mack:   Syndicated Radio Host


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
